display_long_description:
**Block, dodge,** and **strike** your enemies in this action-adventure roguelite set in an ever-changing world inspired by old Norse myths.

The version available now is a **complete single-player experience**, built around physical combat, exploration, and progression. **Multiplayer and co-op features are getting a bit of extra love and polish and will arrive in a free update in the new year.**

[media]

# Combat

- Wield blades, clubs, axes, and bows, each with multiple variants to shape your playstyle

- Fight, block, and dodge Trolls, Draugr, Ghosts, and other beings drawn from Nordic folklore

- Claim altar-born powers, trinkets, and upgrades to craft your own fighting style

- Cast mighty spells using a gesture-based spell system designed specifically for VR

- Face powerful bosses as you push deeper in search of the Nornir

[media]

# Experience

- Explore forests, ruins, and deep caves that reform with every run

- Uncover hidden stories and rebuild the memory of a lost village, piece by piece

- Learn from each fall and carry that knowledge into your next crossing

- Experience a focused **single-player journey now,** with **seamless ambient and friend-based co-op coming in the new year**

[media]

Fight alone for now and you will soon stand side-by-side with others.
Every crossing leaves a mark, and every choice carries the weight of fate.
